name: Ultimate FootBall Super League: Game
description:
Ultimate FootBall Super League:Game is the clash league of football dream superstar soccer players. If you ready to enter in the field, play epic flick soccer games and win the cup, than don't wait just go to the app store and download most challenging 20 teams football match.

Only the top soccer stars hero in world football league history can enter in this ultimate soccer tournament. Select your dream and favorite team to beat the opponent team al world level. Print your name in the list of world top football players.Take realist player control of every action, Pass, headshot, kick, running and defense on the full crowded ground in a realistic way that only provided by
Ultimate FootBall Super League:Game

Football is the world number one sport game. Soccer fans won't miss any football
championship to see those outstanding soccer playerstars in action playing, strategy classic or practice matches. Amazing 3d game graphics & Player animation: we use the best soccer players in history in
Ultimate FootBall Super League:Game, quick movement of players with very high quality level.

How to play:

Control your player with joystick
Press pass button to kick and give pass other player
Shoot button for power shoot for goal
Pause button for stop the game
Goals are shown on bottom center screen of iPhone

Ultimate FootBall Super League:Game Features:

More than 20 teams with original kit
Realistic player pass and power shoot animation
Player & goal keeper defense animation
Smooth gameplay and optimized graphics
Appreciation after goal
Stadium with full crowd
Challenge your friends and beat them
Ultimate responsive player control
